episodes.title: TLC's The Cult of the Real Housewife: Recap and Reflection
episodes.description: In this episode, we break down TLC’s three-part documentary event The Cult of the Real Housewife, a chilling deep dive into the allegations surrounding Real Housewives of Salt Lake City star Mary Cosby and the Faith Temple Pentecostal Church. Using leaked audio, interviews with former church members, family testimony, and expert analysis on religious cults, the documentary paints a disturbing picture of fear-based faith, financial exploitation, emotional manipulation, and absolute control. We recap all three episodes — “It’s a Cult,” “That’s When the Trouble Started,” and “A Message of Fear and Control” and unpack how Mary Cosby’s rise to power, controversial marriage to her step-grandfather Robert Cosby Sr., and leadership style fractured families, isolated congregants, and weaponized God as a tool of domination. Follow the On a Real Note Podcast on Social Media: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/onarealnotepod/ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@onarealnotepod Twitter: https://twitter.com/onarealnotepod YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@OnARealNotePod Visit our website: https://www.onarealnote.com/
